title: How to Download Apps in Windows 7

steps.title: Navigate to the site with the download you want.
steps.content: Navigate to the site with the download you want. You can use any desktop web browser to download and install programs.

steps.title: Click the download button or link.
steps.content: Click the download button or link. Depending on the site, you may have a link or button to click to prompt your files to download. Make sure you're downloading from reputable sources, or you could run the risk of downloading a file with malware that could harm your computer. Click Save to download the file. Most computers will default to save your file in the "Downloads" folder.

steps.title: Click the downloaded file to open it.
steps.content: Click the downloaded file to open it. Many browsers, like Chrome, will notify you once the file is downloading, and you can click the notification to open it. Alternatively, you can find the downloaded file in your "Downloads" folder unless you previously chose a specific location. You'll want to click the .exe file to run an installation wizard.

steps.title: Follow the on-screen instructions to install the downloaded file.
steps.content: Follow the on-screen instructions to install the downloaded file. Follow the installation wizard, clicking Yes or Ok to continue. You'll find the program in your Start menu. [2] X Research source
